pages.title: Overchanting
pages.text: Your familiarity with both magic and the [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) has opened new doors for you:\[#](449900)Overchanting[#]().\\Packing so much magical energy into a single [#](bb00bb)Enchanted Book[#]() will be expensive. _Very expensive_.

pages.title: Spectrum Enchantments
pages.text: - Clovers' Favor: 3 => 6\- Disarming: 2 => 4\- Exuberance: 5 => 10\- First Strike: 2 => 5\- Improved Critical: 2 => 4\- Inertia: 2 => 5\- Tight Grip: 2 => 4\- Treasure Hunter: 3 => 5\- Sniper: 2 => 4

pages.title: Vanilla Enchantments
pages.text: - Bane of Arthropods: 5 => 8\- Blast Protection: 4 => 8\- Depth Strider: 3 => 3\- Efficiency: 5 => 8\- Feather Falling: 4 => 6\- Fire Aspect: 2 => 4\- Fire Protection: 4 => 8\- Fortune: 3 => 5\- Frost Walker: 2 => 4\- Impaling: 5 => 8\- Knockback: 2 => 5\- Looting: 3 => 6\- Loyalty: 3 => 4\- Luck of the Sea: 3 => 5

- Lure: 3 => 5\- Piercing: 4 => 8\- Power: 5 => 8\- Proj. Protection: 4 => 8\- Protection: 4 => 8\- Punch: 2 => 5\- Quick Charge: 3 => 5\- Respiration: 3 => 6\- Riptide: 3 => 4\- Sharpness: 5 => 8\- Smite: 5 => 8\- Soul Speed: 3 => 4\- Sweeping Edge: 3 => 7\- Thorns: 3 => 6\- Unbreaking: 3 => 6
